Question: This person was inducted onto the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1980 as member of The ____s and in 1984 as solo artist.
Hints: Originally, Rowe and this person had no plans to marry, but this person's mother Katherine persuaded them to do so.
This person broke a Guinness World Record when 504,000 people attended seven sold-out shows at Wembley Stadium.
This person rehearsed in Los Angeles in the weeks leading up to the tour under the direction of choreographer Kenny Ortega.
